mapper.sql: id, dcid, ocid, exchange_rate, status, month, begin_valid_date, end_valid_date, created_user, created_time
mapper.select:
SELECT cr.id, CONCAT(REPLACE(cr.`month`,'-','年'),'月') monthStr, c2.currency_name dCurrencyName, ci.currency_name oCurrencyName, cr.exchange_rate exchangeRate, DATE_FORMAT(cr.begin_valid_date, '%Y-%m-%d') beginValidDateStr, DATE_FORMAT(cr.end_valid_date, '%Y-%m-%d') endValidDateStr, cr.created_user createdUser, cr.created_time createdTimeStr FROM currency_rate cr LEFT JOIN currency_info ci ON cr.ocid = ci.id left join currency_info c2 on c2.id = cr.dcid
and cr.month = #{form.month}
